TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ButtonField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示在資料繫結控制項中顯示為按鈕的欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a button in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 若要顯示的按鈕會顯示每一筆記錄。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a button for each record that is displayed. 物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 按一下按鈕欄位中的按鈕，就會引發命令事件的父資料繫結控制項。Clicking a button in a button field raises the command event of the parent data-bound control. 您可以提供要藉由提供命令事件的事件處理常式在按一下命令按鈕時執行的自訂常式。You can provide a custom routine to perform when a command button is clicked by providing an event handler for the command event. > [!NOTE] > 控制引發事件，而控制引發事件。The control raises the event, while the control raises the event. 若要判斷引發命令事件記錄的索引，請使用事件引數傳遞至命令事件的資料繫結控制項的屬性。To determine the index of the record that raises the command event, use the property of the event argument that is passed to the command event for the data-bound control. 類別會自動填入具有適當的索引值的屬性。The class automatically populates the property with the appropriate index value. 若要指定要顯示的按鈕類型，請使用屬性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 當顯示的連結或命令按鈕時，使用屬性來指定要顯示在按鈕中的標題。When displaying a link or command button, use the property to specify the caption to display in the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定屬性中的所有按鈕共用相同的標題。If you set the property, all buttons in a share the same caption. 或者，您可以繫結物件至資料來源中的欄位。Alternatively, you can bind the object to a field in a data source. 這可讓您顯示不同的標題中的按鈕物件。This allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the object. 指定之欄位中的值會用於按鈕的文字標題。The values that are in the specified field are used for the text captions of the buttons. 設定要繫結屬性物件至資料來源中的欄位。Set the property to bind a object to a field in a data source. 當顯示影像按鈕時，使用屬性來指定要顯示在按鈕的影像物件。When displaying an image button, use the property to specify the image to display for the buttons in the object. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有按鈕物件共用相同的映像。All buttons in a object share the same image. 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件屬性`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 物件可讓您自訂其頁首和頁尾區段。The object allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示的標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 而不是顯示在標頭區段的文字，您可以藉由設定顯示影像屬性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隱藏在標頭區段物件、 設定屬性`false`。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別按鈕欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 顯示或隱藏的整個標頭區段的資料繫結控制項 （如果有的話），請使用`ShowHeader`控制項的屬性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control. 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|樣式設定The style settings for| |--------------------|----------------------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的。The child Web server controls of the .| ||頁尾區段。The footer section of the .| ||標頭區段。The header section of the .| ||資料中的項目。The data items in the .| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件，以顯示資料行中的命令按鈕的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of command buttons in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要加入物件以動態方式加入資料繫結控制項，會建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To add a object dynamically to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the data-bound control. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以將欄位加入動態資料繫結控制項，但欄位應該宣告為靜態，並接著顯示或隱藏，做為適當的。Although you can add fields dynamically to a data-bound control, fields should be declared statically, and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有欄位可都減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor 建構函式加入以動態方式為物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor constructor to add a object dynamically to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/CS/buttonfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/VB/buttonfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，表示按一下 物件中的按鈕時要執行的動作。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that represents the action to perform when a button in a object is clicked.

value.span: 按一下 中的按鈕時要執行的動作名稱。

span.span: The name of the action to perform when a button in the is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相關聯的命令名稱，例如屬性`"Add"`或`"Remove"`，按鈕的物件。Use the property to associate a command name, such as `"Add"` or `"Remove"`, with the buttons in the object. 您可以設定屬性，以任何字串，識別要在按一下命令按鈕時執行的動作。You can set the property to any string that identifies the action to perform when the command button is clicked. 您可以透過程式設計方式判斷事件處理常式中的命令名稱並執行適當的動作。You can then programmatically determine the command name in an event handler and perform the appropriate actions. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有按鈕物件共用相同的命令名稱。All buttons in a object share the same command name. 資料繫結控制項辨識某些命令名稱，並自動引發和處理控制項的適當事件。Data-bound controls recognize certain command names and automatically raise and handle the appropriate events for the control. 會辨識下列的命令名稱：The following command names are recognized: - `"Cancel"` - `"Delete"` - `"Edit"` - `"Insert"` - `"New"` - `"Page"` - `"Select"` - `"Sort"` - `"Update"` 要叫用分頁，設定至`"Page"`和包含控制權傳輸至`"First"`， `"Last"`， `"Prev"`， `"Next"`，或頁碼。To invoke paging, set the to `"Page"` and the of the contained control to `"First"`, `"Last"`, `"Prev"`, `"Next"`, or a page number. 不過，由於如控制項都是整數資料列索引，控制項不是適用於叫用分頁。However, since the for a control is always the integer row index, a control is not suitable for invoking paging. 同樣地，雖然您可以叫用依設定排序至`"Sort"`、屬性控制項都是整數資料列索引。Similarly, while you can invoke sorting by setting the to `"Sort"`, the property for a control is always the integer row index. 基於這個理由，控制項不是適用於叫用排序。For this reason, a control is not suitable for invoking sorting. 自訂命令名稱，例如`"Add"`和`"Remove"`，您需要撰寫事件程式碼，請檢查命令名稱，並執行某些自訂動作。For custom command names, such as `"Add"` and `"Remove"`, you need to write the event code to check the command name and perform some custom action. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的命令名稱會識別每個資料繫結控制項。Not all command names are recognized by every data-bound controls. 例如，`"New"`無法辨識的控制項和`"Select"`無法辨識的控制項。For example, `"New"` is not recognized by the control and `"Select"` is not recognized by the control. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定按鈕的命令名稱物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for the buttons in a object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將目前 物件的屬性複製到指定的 物件。

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，以供方法來複製目前的內容-衍生物件所建立的物件方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method to copy the properties of the current -derived object to the object that was created by the method.

span.para: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，呼叫方法，以確保會複製物件的所有屬性的基底類別。
When overriding the method in a derived class, call the method of the base class to ensure that all properties of the object are copied.

summary.span: 建立並傳回 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，以供若要建立空的基底類別方法要複製目前的內容物件-衍生物件。The method is a helper method that is used by the method of the base class to create an empty object to which to copy the properties of the current -derived object.

span.para: 覆寫方法以傳回衍生類別的新執行個體。請勿呼叫基底類別的方法。
Override the method to return a new instance of the derived class. Do not call the method of the base class.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料欄位的名稱，其值為繫結至由 物件所呈現之 控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field for which the value is bound to the property of the control that is rendered by the object.

value.span: 要繫結至 的欄位的名稱。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性物件設定為或值，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至欄位的名稱物件。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the object. 欄位的值隨即顯示在按鈕的文字為物件。The values of the field are then displayed as the text for the buttons in the object. （選擇性） 您可以格式化顯示的文字，藉由設定屬性。Optionally, you can format the displayed text by setting the property. 而不是使用要繫結屬性物件欄位從資料來源，您可以使用屬性以顯示靜態文字的按鈕文字物件。Instead of using the property to bind a object to a field from a data source, you can use the property to display static text for the text of the buttons in the object. 當屬性時，每個按鈕都共用相同的標題。When the property is used, each button shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定哪些欄位来顯示在資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a column of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataTextFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 格式字串，指定欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: A format string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式的值會顯示在物件。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果未設定屬性、 欄位的值會顯示不含任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the value for the field is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 格式字串套用時，才屬性設定。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含欄位的值的預留位置。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the value for the field. 例如，在格式字串`"Item Value: {0}"`、`{0}`預留位置取代欄位的值，當它出現在物件。For example, in the format string `"Item Value: {0}"`, the `{0}` placeholder is replaced with the value for the field when it is displayed in the object. 格式字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字串不包含預留位置，從資料來源欄位的值是不會包含在最後顯示的文字。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the value for the field from the data source is not included in the final display text. 包含兩個部分，並以分號和包裝在括號，在表單中的預留位置 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定欄位值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the index for the field value in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 這`A`參數是格式化語法的一部分。This `A` parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，這個值只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒號和冒號後面的值是選擇性的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定要在其中顯示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以一般格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六進位格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除了`X`，不區分大小寫的格式字元。Except for `X`, the format characters are not case sensitive. `X`格式字元會顯示在指定的情況下的十六進位字元。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字串`"{0:F2}"`會顯示兩個小數位數定點數字。For example, the format string `"{0:F2}"` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的欄位值的自訂顯示格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the values of a field. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

abstract member FormatDataTextValue : obj -> string override this.FormatDataTextValue : obj -> string

span.span: The field value to format.

summary.span: 格式化 物件中儲存格的指定欄位值。

span.span: Formats the specified field value for a cell in the object.

returns.span: 欄位值，已轉換為 屬性所指定的格式。

span.span: The field value converted to the format specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來轉換成格式所指定的欄位值屬性。The method is a helper method that is used to transform a field value to the format that is specified by the property.

span.para: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫方法，以執行自訂格式化常式。
When extending the class, you can override the method to perform a custom formatting routine.

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示於 物件中之每個按鈕的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display for each button in the object.

value.span: 要顯示於 中之每個按鈕的影像。

span.span: The image to display for each button in the .

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性物件設定為值，請使用屬性來指定要顯示每個按鈕的影像。When the property of a object is set to the value, use the property to specify the image to display for each button. 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等），只要用戶端瀏覽器支援該格式。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示在每個按鈕的影像物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image to display for each button in the object. 若要顯示此程式碼範例，您必須提供自己的映像。For this code example to display, you must provide your own image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/CS/buttonfieldimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/VB/buttonfieldimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

returns.span: ，表示控制項無需重新繫結至資料。

span.span: , which indicates the control does not need to rebind to the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由資料控制項與其呼叫物件與其相關聯執行基本物件初始化的欄位之前的欄位加到資料列集合, 的執行個體。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection. 資料控制項，例如和，呼叫方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法之前其他方法，例如`CreateRow`，呼叫以建立特定的資料列與資料。Data controls, such as and , call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods, such as `CreateRow`, are called to create specific rows with data. 呼叫方法，當您撰寫自訂的資料繫結控制項時，會使用物件來執行基本的初始設定物件。Call The method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for a object. 實作這個方法，如果您-衍生型別需要的任何物件初始設定之前它所擴展,物件與資料或控制項中方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

span.para: 您應該覆寫方法，並傳回，如果此欄位必須在回傳時正常運作的欄位順序中要執行的資料繫結。
You should override the method and return , if the field requires that data binding be performed on postback in order for the field to work correctly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立所指定的按鈕類型屬性並將它加入集合物件。The method creates the button type that is specified by the property and adds it to the collection of the object. 屬性控制設為 `rowIndex`。The property of the control is set to `rowIndex`.

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示於 物件中之每個按鈕的靜態標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the static caption that is displayed for each button in the object.

value.span: 顯示於 中之每個按鈕的標題。

span.span: The caption displayed for each button in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性物件設定為或值，請使用屬性以顯示靜態文字的按鈕標題。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to display static text for the caption of the buttons in the . 每個按鈕會共用相同的標題。Each button shares the same caption. 而不是使用屬性來顯示中的靜態文字物件，您可以使用要繫結屬性至資料來源中的欄位。Instead of using the property to display static text in a object, you can use the property to bind the to a field in a data source. 欄位的值隨即顯示為按鈕的標題。The values of the field are then displayed as the caption of the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果和同時設定屬性，屬性會優先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要在每個按鈕顯示的標題物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display for each button in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 判斷 物件中所包含的控制項是否支援回呼 (Callback)。

span.span: Determines whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is a helper method that is used to determine whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks. 這個方法會實作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼。This method is implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers.

span.para: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫方法，指出控制項所包含的欄位是否支援回呼。若要指示支援回呼，方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況; 否則會發生例外狀況擲回以有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼。

Classes that derive from the class can override the method to indicate whether the controls that are contained by the field support callbacks. To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement the method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
